item.title: PARK OHIO HOLDINGS CORP 10-K
item.description: PARK OHIO HOLDINGS CORP, which is in the Metal Forging & Stampings [3460] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 16, 2022 had 20899 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
